channel.title: Today In History
channel.description: An automated daily podcast that covers an event from today in history.
channel.author: Matt Greene
channel.itunes:author: Matt Greene
channel.itunes:subtitle: An automated daily podcast that covers an event from today in history.
channel.itunes:summary: An automated daily podcast that covers an event from today in history.
